Q_DESC:
Write a  program to simulate sequential file allocation.In this file organisation, the records of the file are stored one after another both physically and logically. 
That is, record with sequence number 16 is located just after the 15th record. A record of a sequential file can only be accessed by reading all the previous records.
TESTCASE_1:
5

B 78 11
C 53 14
D 23 7
E 61 5
